recipe.title: Stuffed Dates with Mascarpone, Pistachios and Pomegranate

directions.step: Toast the pistachio nuts in a dry frying pan over medium heat until lightly golden and toasted smelling. To cut the pomegranate open, make 5 slashes from top to bottom on each side. Carefully prise open the skin and remove a large handful of the seeds. Pick out any small bits of the pith from the seeds and discard.

With your fingers, tear open each date and remove the pit. Using a teaspoon, stuff each cavity with the mascarpone. Press a few pomegranate seeds and one or two pistachio nuts into the mascarpone. Arrange on a decorative plate and serve.
